level.heading: Transition provisions as to priorities.
level.text: Except as otherwise provided in this article, the Uniform Commercial Code effective January 1, 1965, shall apply to any questions of priority if the positions of the parties were fixed prior to the effective date of this act (as provided in section 28:11-101). In other cases questions of priority shall be determined by this act.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-85
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 28:11-101.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: "This act", referred to in this section, is D.C. Law 4-85.
